statements: SELECT * FROM music_recommendations WHERE genre = 'Rock'
SELECT artist, song FROM music_recommendations WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM music_recommendations ORDER BY genre DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_recommendations FROM music_recommendations
SELECT user_id, genre, artist, song FROM music_recommendations ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM music_recommendations ORDER BY user_id DESC, artist ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT artist, genre FROM music_recommendations WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY artist ASC;
SELECT user_id, song FROM music_recommendations WHERE artist = 'Ed Sheeran';
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM music_recommendations;
SELECT * FROM music_recommendations WHERE genre = 'Pop' AND artist = 'Taylor Swift' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, preferred_genres FROM users WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(preferred_genres, 1) > 2;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, recommendation, recommendation_score FROM music_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, listening_history -> 'song_title' AS favorite_song FROM users WHERE listening_history @> '[{"song_title": "Bohemian Rhapsody"}]';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, listening_history FROM users WHERE preferred_genres @> ARRAY['pop']::TEXT[];
SELECT * FROM music_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8;
SELECT u.username, mr.recommendation FROM users u INNER JOIN music_recommendations mr ON u.user_id = mr.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_recommendations, AVG(recommendation_score) AS avg_score FROM music_recommendations;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ListeningHistory LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, track_id, listen_date FROM ListeningHistory WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY listen_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Genres;
SELECT genre_name, genre_id FROM Genres WHERE genre_id < 5 ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ListeningHistory WHERE listen_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT song_name, genre_name FROM songs JOIN genres ON songs.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(song_id) AS total_songs FROM user_history GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT genre_name FROM genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.username, genres.genre_name, songs.song_name FROM users INNER JOIN songs ON users.user_id = songs.genre_id INNER JOIN genres ON genres.genre_id = songs.genre_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(song_id) AS song_count FROM user_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(song_id) > 10;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(user_history.song_id) AS history_count FROM users LEFT JOIN user_history ON users.user_id = user_history.user_id GROUP BY users.username;

SELECT DISTINCT users.username, songs.song_name, genres.genre_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_history ON users.user_id = user_history.user_id INNER JOIN songs ON user_history.song_id = songs.song_id INNER JOIN genres ON songs.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'John';
SELECT song_name, genre_id FROM songs WHERE genre_id = '1234';
SELECT user_id, listening_date FROM user_listening_history ORDER BY listening_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_song_id FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = '5678';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN user_listening_history ON users.user_id = user_listening_history.user_id WHERE listening_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT songs.song_name, genres.genre_name FROM songs JOIN genres ON songs.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
